AUTHOR: Hexexpeck
DESCRIPTION: A cog that contains commands for Python's package/dependency manager pip, currently has only install, upgrade, and uninstall commands. More added in soon.
INSTALL_MSG: Thank you for installing the PipTools cog! Use [p]help pip to get started. This cog currently only has pip install, upgrade, and uninstall commands. More added soon.
NAME: PipTools
SHORT: A cog that helps with Python's pip package/dependency manager.
